Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number/LessThan
Synopsis Less than operator on numeric values.
Syntax Exp1 < Exp2
Types
Exp1 Exp2 Exp1 < Exp2
int int bool
int real bool
real real bool
Description Yields true if the value of Exp1 is numerically less than the value of Exp2, and false otherwise.
Examples 
rascal>13 < 12
bool: false
rascal>12 < 13
bool: true
rascal>13.5 < 12
bool: false
rascal>12.5 < 13
bool: true
Questions
Question 1.
The type of 19 < 19 is

Question 2.
The type of -8.82416674181762000 < -14.00271578266487600 is

Question 3.
The type of -16.843421897925519200 < 11.8236567545449600 is

Question 4.
The type of 14 < 19 is

Question 5. 
4 < -18.589118185888429200 ==
